channel.title: Smoking Cigarettes
channel.description: Discuss or debate your person viewpoints about smoking cigarettes here. I personally smoke everyday and I am trying to quit. It is not easy to quit smoking cigarettes but I believe eventually I will overcome my addiction.

item.title: Smoking Cigarettes
item.dc:creator: @93dcthugs93 93dcthugs93
item.description:
@93dcthugs93 wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:81, topic:17172”][quote author=pk4pk link=topic=25716.msg2095768#msg2095768 date=1205003486]

Just out of curiosity, what is it that makes cigarette smoking “disgusting” but pot smoking OK?

I mean, in both cases you are inhaling burning lumps of carbon and coating your lungs with tar, which isn’t the most delightful image, even I must admit.

something being disgusting, and something being ok are two different things.
and pot does not contain tar…

pot is also less harmful than a cigarette.
[/quote]That is so wrong. Pot has 10x more tobbaco then a regular cig.

No, he is right.

What you just said makes absolutely no sense, whatsoever. There is no “tobacco” in pot, unless you mix it in.

If we are speaking tar-wise, then pot actually has 33% of the tar that a cig has. Pot is much healthier. School is retarded, they will lie through their teeth about drugs. And lets not forget that you don’t smoke 15 joints a day. Some people have a joint every other week, some will do it once a day or so… etc[/quote]

thanks for clearing that up.

Read full topic

item.title: Smoking Cigarettes
item.dc:creator: @mikkomainer Secet
item.description:
@mikkomainer wrote:

Chimaera God:

Why smoke cigarettes? All they do is screw with your lungs and make you smell bad. Weed is a different story though; at least it makes you feel good.

Cigarettes calm you down. My hands have been shaking abit (you know, when you can’t keep your fingers steady, almost like hangover morning but not that bad) for my whole life, but when I smoke it stops. So that’s one reason.
Smoking is also very social event, I rarely smoke alone. At the parties I have met so many boys and girls because we were smoking at the same time.

Read full topic

item.title: Smoking Cigarettes
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“pk4pk, post:77, topic:17172”][quote author=93dcthugs93 link=topic=25716.msg2095755#msg2095755 date=1205003246]

Just out of curiosity, what is it that makes cigarette smoking “disgusting” but pot smoking OK?

I mean, in both cases you are inhaling burning lumps of carbon and coating your lungs with tar, which isn’t the most delightful image, even I must admit.

something being disgusting, and something being ok are two different things.
and pot does not contain tar…

pot is also less harmful than a cigarette.
[/quote]That is so wrong. Pot has 10x more tobbaco then a regular cig.[/quote]

No, he is right.

What you just said makes absolutely no sense, whatsoever. There is no “tobacco” in pot, unless you mix it in.

If we are speaking tar-wise, then pot actually has 33% of the tar that a cig has. Pot is much healthier. School is retarded, they will lie through their teeth about drugs. And lets not forget that you don’t smoke 15 joints a day. Some people have a joint every other week, some will do it once a day or so… etc

Read full topic
